doc.field: The folder holds the following items: 2 tickets to a Jenny Lind concert at Castle Garden on May 24, 1852 (Gift, Buffalo History Museum, 2020); admission ticket to the reception for Admiral Dewey in New York City on September 30, 1899; a sticker commemorating the 150th anniversary of the U.S. Constitution in 1937, distributed by Pep Boys (gift, 2008); the seating list for the 1948 Unification Dinner held at the Waldorf-Astoria; mailing by the Railway and Locomotive Historical Society, New York Chapter, regarding a commemoration of the centennials of the New York and Harlem Railroads at New-York Historical on February 16, 1945; an invitation to the 1972 dedication of the American Museum of Immigration on Liberty Island; and a booklet of songs, prayers and statements published by the Salesian Mission on the occasion of the 1976 American Bicentennial.
